creator: azeem_agha@hotmail.com
text:
I install Apache version 2.0.59,when i click on apache.exe it return error like this

"<OS 10048> Only one usage of each socket address ( protocol / network address /
port ) is normally permitted: make_sock : could not bind to adddress 0.0.0.0:80,
no listening sockets available, shutting down, unable to open logs"

This is the error, can you please tell me that how to resolve on this issue.
please response me as soon as possible.

Nope - bugzilla is not a user support forum.  See the user peer-to-peer
mailing list for troubleshooting help.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
